sourcesContent:
import React,{useState} from 'react';
import {Link,Redirect} from 'react-router-dom';
import {Box, Form,FormField,TextInput,Button,Anchor,RadioButtonGroup} from 'grommet';
import '../App.css';
const defvalue={
    name:"",
    email:"",
    paswd:"",
    conpaswd:"",
    gen:"",
    dob:"",
};
function Sign() {
    const [value,setvalue]=useState(defvalue);
    return (
        <Box fill={true}   justify="center"  align="center" background={{color:"dark-1"}}>
            <Box background={{color:"light-2"}} justify="center" round="small" pad="large" margin={{left:"medium",right:"medium"}} height="auto" >
                <Form value={value} onChange={update=>setvalue(update)} onSubmit={(event)=>console.log(event.value)}>
                    <FormField label="Name" name="name">
                        <TextInput name="name" />
                    </FormField>
                    <FormField label="Email" name="email">
                        <TextInput name="email" />
                    </FormField>
                    <FormField label="Password" name="paswd">
                        <TextInput type="password" name="paswd" />
                    </FormField>
                    <FormField label="Confirm Password" name="conpaswd">
                        <TextInput type="password" name="conpaswd" />
                    </FormField>
                    <FormField label="Gender" name="gen">
                        <RadioButtonGroup name="gen" options={["Male","Female"]} />

                    </FormField>
                    <FormField label="Date Of Birth" name="dob">
                        <TextInput type="calender" name="dob" />
                    </FormField>
                    <Box direction="column" justify="center" gap="small" margin={{top:"medium"}} >
                        <Button size="medium" fill={false} type="submit" label="Sign-in" primary color="brand" alignSelf="center" />
                            

                    </Box>
                </Form>

            </Box>
            
        </Box>
    )
}

export default Sign;
